original_text: When Solomon had finished building the temple of the Lord and the royal palace, and had achieved all he had desired to do,
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 성전과 왕궁 건축하기를 마치며 자기가 이루기를 원하던 모든 것을 마친 때에

sentences.original_text: When Solomon had finished building the temple of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬이 주의 성전 건축을 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: and had achieved all he had desired to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하고자 했던 모든 것을 이루었을 때
